title: The Last of the Romantics: Why I Want to See Julian Alaphilippe Win with Panache Over Power Meters
content:
Tour de Hoody: Alaphilippe refuses to let data override his unbridled racing style and thatâ€™s something every cycling fan can cheer for in 2025: 'Panache and aggression can always beat power numbers.'
